text: Aur inhi badwiyon mein kuch log aisey bhi hain jo Allah aur roz-e-aakhir par iman rakhte hain aur jo kuch kharch karte hain usey Allah ke haan taqarrub(nearness) ka aur Rasool ki taraf se rehmat ki duaein lene ka zariya banate hain. Haan! Woh zaroor inke liye taqarrub (nearness) ka zariya hai aur Allah zaroor inko apni rehmat mein dakhil karega. Yaqeenan Allah darguzar karne wala aur reham farmane wala hai
